title: Wanted to Buy Small T204 Reprints
author: sb1

posts.post_title: Wanted to Buy Small T204 Reprints
posts.post_content:
I am looking to buy or trade for a specific group of T204 Ramly reprints. These are NOT the normal sized reprints found on Ebay most of the time, these are 1 5/8" x 2" on photographic type stock. They have a glossy front with no embossing. The example shown before is just a bit under actual size.

Let me know if you have any available, 1 or a 101.

Scott
